text: (alhamd llh rabb alealamina) althna' ealaa allah bsfath alty klluha awsaf kmal, wbnemh alzzahirat walbatnt, aldiyniat waldnywyt, wafi dmnh 'amr lieibadih 'ana yhmdwh, fahu almsthq lah whdh, wahu subhanah almnshy llkhlq, alqayim bamwrhm, almrby lajamie khalaqah bnemh, wlawlyayh bial'iiman waleamal alsalh
